original_title: Confessions of a Teenage Step Daughter
overview: Ssshhh, your Stepdaughter wants to confess something to you. She wants you to keep it a secret. She knows mommy will be very mad if she finds out. Your Stepdaughter has a crush on you. She doesn't want you to fuck her like mommy. She wants you to fuck her harder and nastier. Your Stepdaughter is a naughty little girl.
title: Confessions of a Teenage Step Daughter
